response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its true value to be over $15,000. Considering this, I am offering it to you for $18,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the potential return on investment for you. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 18000}
